Khonkolor

"HEY BUDDY" Said Khonkolor to Halucigen "Give five, PAL... We have 
given him a good fight to that Decepticon... I'm Khonkolor... who're 
you? HEY BIRD-BOT... WHERE ARE YOU DOING??? WHY ARE YOU LEAVING US???"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen looked around to the destruction that was the CF battle 
and 
> the seemingly one enemy bot still fighting....but who was the enemy 
> to him.  He had only fought with the Maximal's to save his own 
> hide...they were different then him. He was destructive and nasty. 
> They were honourable and good. Definetly not his style. He had 
fixed 
> that one bot for the fact that he had saved him. But nothing to 
> matter. He had learned many secrets of this faction as well as 
thier 
> base from his brief look into the thoughts of Prowl.
> He looked to the sky and took off transforming to his vulture mode 
> and flying off into the distance. Two things for sure on his 
> mind....he needed a faction to join....and that the Maximals were 
not 
> it.
